snippet: Adam D. Tihany has designed seven restaurants for Thomas Keller and three for Daniel Boulud. His next frontier: the Polo Lounge.
abstract: Restaurant designer Adam D Tihany, who has partnered with many big names in the restaurant industry, describes working with top chefs, putting his stamp on legendary hotels and nurturing his true sense of national identity.
lead_paragraph: Adam D. Tihany has designed seven restaurants for Thomas Keller and three for Daniel Boulud. His next frontier: the Polo Lounge.

headline.seo: Adam D. Tihany on His Work for Celebrity Restaurateurs
headline.main: Designer for the Stars of the Restaurant Galaxy
headline.print_headline: Designer for the Stars of the Restaurant Galaxy
